sampleGoals: ΓÇó Assign work to the correct resolver group/workflow on first pass.
ΓÇó Reduce mean time to triage and misroutes.
sampleExamples: ΓÇó Prompts: Categorize and route this incident to the right team.
ΓÇó Prompts: Why was this assigned to this resolver group?
sampleSecurity: ΓÇó Data sensitivity: Confidential (customer + network data).
ΓÇó Minimum required access only (least privilege) via RBAC
operationalDetails:
Workflow:
ΓÇó Read the work item context (summary, category, signals, attachments).
ΓÇó Classify using rules + ML features (keywords, topology, history).
ΓÇó Select target queue/group and recommended prio
